body: "On February 23, people from the ten regions of Guyana converge on the country’s capital to participate in the grand, massive carnival-like event, with costumed bands and a float parade": Repeating Islands blogs about the Mashramani festival.
original_body: "On February 23, people from the ten regions of Guyana converge on the country’s capital to participate in the grand, massive carnival-like event, with costumed bands and a float parade": Repeating Islands blogs about the Mashramani festival.
title: Guyana: Mashramani Festival
